annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 25-175: § 45 of D.C. Law 25-175 provided that the creation of this section by § 28(c) of D.C. Law 25-175 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 7290(b) of Fiscal Year 2025 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-506, July 15, 2024, 71 DCR 8406).

Section 7290(b) of D.C. Act 25-506 amended section 45(a)(1) of D.C. Law 25-175 removing the applicability provision impacting this section. Therefore the amendment of this section by section 28(c) of Law 25-175 has been implemented.

Section 7290(b) of Law 25-218 amended section 45(a)(1) of D.C. Law 25-175 removing the applicability provision impacting this section. Therefore the amendment of this section by section 28(c) of Law 25-175 has been implemented.
